headline: Hot Days Don't Have to Mean High Bills
summary: With the first major heat wave of the season approaching, FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) is here to help you with practical tips to stay cool, comfortable and in control of your energy costs.

headline: FirstEnergy price target lowered to $47 from $48 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley lowered the firm’s price target on FirstEnergy (FE) to $47 from $48 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm is updating its price targets for stocks in the Regulated & Diversified Utilities / IPPs North America sector, noting utilities underperformed the S&P in May, the analyst tells investors.
